SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uid_enroll WHERE status = 'S' AND DATE_ADD(update_dt, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} day), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uid_enroll WHERE status = 'S'

SELECT a.uid, b.en_name AS exchangeName, DATE_ADD(a.update_dt, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS updateDt FROM uid_enroll a JOIN exchange b ON b.exchange_no = a.exchange_no WHERE status = 'S' ORDER BY a.update_dt ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uid_enroll a JOIN exchange b ON b.exchange_no = a.exchange_no

SELECT a.enroll_no, b.en_name AS exchangeName, a.uid, a.status, DATE_ADD(a.create_dt, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS createDt, DATE_ADD(a.update_dt, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS updateDt FROM uid_enroll a JOIN exchange b ON b.exchange_no = a.exchange_no ORDER BY a.create_dt DESC LIMIT #{currentPage}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uid_enroll WHERE enroll_no = #{enrollNo} AND status = 'P'
